text: N’intumwa zacu mugihe zashikira intumwa y’Imana Lutwi (iii) yaramaramaye kubera abo bashitsi no kumutima wiwe waciye uba nabi kubera abo bashitsi bamushikiye, nabo baca bavuga bati:- ntugire ubwoba, kandi ntuteterwe ntankeka twebwe turakurokora wewe hamwe n’abantu bawe bose, dukuye mwo umutambukanyi wawe ari mu bantu bazoba bicaye inyuma y’abandi
